items.title: iPhone 17 Pro 最终传闻：橙色和蓝色、均热板及更多 (原标题: Final iPhone 17 Pro Rumors: Orange and Blue, Vapor Chamber, and More)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## iPhone 17 Pro 最终传闻汇总

### 发布时间与主要来源

文章指出，在苹果特别活动前夕（2025年9月8日），彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）列出了他对iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max的一些关键新功能预测。

### iPhone 17 Pro/Pro Max 关键新功能预测（来自古尔曼）

古尔曼预计这些设备将具备以下特性：

*   **颜色选项：** 将提供独特的橙色和蓝色作为新的颜色选项。
*   **光学变焦：** 光学变焦功能将得到改进，可能达到8倍限制，高于iPhone 16 Pro型号的5倍。
*   **散热系统：** 采用均热板（Vapor Chamber）冷却系统，以改善散热性能。
*   **外部设计：** 外部设计将有所改变，包括重新设计的后置摄像头系统，该系统将包含三颗4800万像素的摄像头。

这些传闻此前已有提及，古尔曼的额外证实为这些信息增添了可信度。

![iPhone 17 Pro Dark Blue and Orange](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7XLBgJ_gsPE5c6v4M-puP3n8GKc=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-17-Pro-Dark-Blue-and-Orange.jpg?lossy)

### 其他相关传闻

文章还提到了其他一些热门传闻：

*   **显示屏与电池：**
    *   据微博爆料者“Instant Digital”称，iPhone 17 Pro型号将配备更高亮度的显示屏，使其更适合长时间在阳光直射下使用。
*   **设计细节：**
    *   彭博社的马克·古尔曼在其报告中提到，iPhone 17 Pro型号将有一个“位于手机底部三分之二处的新切口区域，兼作无线充电区域”。
*   **AirPods Pro 3：**
    *   根据微博爆料者和供应链分析师郭明錤（Ming-Chi Kuo）的报告，苹果正准备在2025年推出两款版本的AirPods Pro 3，可能最早在本周的苹果“Awe dropping”活动中亮相。
    *   郭明錤还指出，苹果计划在2026年推出今年AirPods Pro 3的继任者。
    *   目前未提及AirPods Pro 3的具体新功能。
*   **电池容量：**
    *   在中国监管数据库中，iPhone 17系列设备的电池容量据称已浮出水面，并由X账户“ShrimpApplePro”分享。其中包括iPhone 17 Air、iPhone 17 Pro等型号的电池容量信息。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17 Pro系列最新传闻指出，新机型将提供橙色和蓝色配色，光学变焦提升至8倍，并采用均热板散热系统。后置摄像头系统将重新设计，配备三颗4800万像素摄像头。其他亮点包括更高亮度的显示屏和独特的无线充电区域。同时，AirPods Pro 3预计在2025年与iPhone 17一同发布，其继任者可能在2026年推出。iPhone 17系列电池容量也已曝光。

images.alt: iPhone 17 Pro Dark Blue and Orange

items.content:
On the eve of Apple's special event, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman has listed some of the key new features he expects for the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max.


Gurman expects the following for the devices:
  • Orange and Blue will be the unique new color options

  • Improved optical zoom, with perhaps an 8× limit, up from 5× on the iPhone 16 Pro models

  • A vapor chamber cooling system for improved heat dissipation

  • External design changes, including a redesigned rear camera system with three 48-megapixel cameras
All of those things have already been rumored, but extra corroboration is always nice, as we count down the final hours until Apple's official announcements.

items.title: AirPods Pro 3 不会有‘重大’音频或主动降噪改进 (原标题: AirPods Pro 3 Won't Get 'Major' Audio or Active Noise Cancellation Improvements)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# AirPods Pro 3 预期特性概览

根据彭博社的Mark Gurman报道，苹果预计将于2025年9月9日发布的新款AirPods Pro 3，在音频质量和主动降噪（ANC）方面将不会有“重大”改进。

![AirPods Pro 3 模拟功能图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/d4KK2HXelVaq6ZebB9YQi5tRD5U=/400x0/article-new/2025/04/AirPods-Pro-3-Mock-Feature.jpg?lossy)

**主要新功能和改进：**

*   **心率追踪：**
    *   AirPods Pro 3将引入心率追踪功能，这是苹果首次在Powerbeats Pro 2中推出的健康相关特性。
    *   通过LED光学传感器脉冲测量血流量来追踪心率。
    *   如果功能与Powerbeats Pro 2类似，心率数据将与流行的健身应用同步。
*   **设计更新：**
    *   耳塞将采用更新的设计，以提供更好的佩戴舒适度，但具体细节尚未披露。
    *   充电盒也将变得更纤薄，尺寸更小，类似于AirPods 4的充电盒。

**音频和降噪方面的预期：**

*   尽管此前有传闻称AirPods Pro 3将拥有“更好”的主动降噪功能，且Gurman本人也曾提及将配备新的H3芯片（新芯片通常意味着音频质量和ANC的改进），但最新消息表明，这些方面的提升可能不显著。
*   文章指出，虽然仍可能有一些小幅提升，但AirPods Pro 3的重点似乎主要集中在新的健康功能上。
items.shortSummary: 苹果即将发布的AirPods Pro 3预计在音频质量和主动降噪方面不会有重大改进。其核心新功能是心率追踪，通过LED光学传感器测量血流量并同步至健身应用。此外，AirPods Pro 3将采用更新设计以提升佩戴舒适度，充电盒也将更纤薄小巧。此次更新的重点似乎主要放在健康功能上。
items.translated_title: AirPods Pro 3 不会有‘重大’音频或主动降噪改进
items.content:
The upcoming AirPods Pro 3 that Apple is expected to unveil tomorrow will not include notable improvements to audio quality or Active Noise Cancellation, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


Apple's new earbuds will have heart rate tracking, a health-related feature that Apple first introduced with the Powerbeats Pro 2. LED optical sensors will pulse to measure heart rate using blood flow, and if the ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ work like the Powerbeats Pro 2, the data will sync with popular fitness apps.

The ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ will also feature an updated design for a better fit, though there are no details on what exactly is going to change. The case is also going to be slimmed down, and it will be smaller like the AirPods 4 case.

News of no significant changes to ANC or audio quality is disappointing. There were some rumors of "much better" Active Noise Cancellation and Gurman himself said the AirPods would include a new H3 chip. New chips typically mean improvements to audio quality and ANC, and we could still get some small boosts, but it sounds like most of the focus will be on the new health feature.
This article, "AirPods Pro 3 Won't Get 'Major' Audio or Active Noise Cancellation Improvements" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: iPhone 17：苹果发布会前夕的最新传闻汇总 (原标题: iPhone 17: Last Minute Rumor Recap Ahead of Tomorrow's Apple Event)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iPhone 17：苹果发布会前夕的最新传闻汇总

在9月9日苹果发布会即将到来之际，关于iPhone 17系列的最新传闻不断涌现。以下是过去几天内收集到的关键信息汇总：

## 电池容量
据中国监管数据库泄露的信息（该数据库此前提供的电池信息准确性较高），iPhone 17各型号的电池容量如下：

*   **iPhone 17**：3,692 mAh
*   **iPhone 17 Air**：3,149 mAh
*   **iPhone 17 Pro**：4,252 mAh
*   **iPhone 17 Pro Max**：5,088 mAh

需要注意的是，这些容量数据适用于不带SIM卡托的型号（例如在美国销售的版本）。在中国等需要物理SIM卡托的国家，销售的型号电池容量会略小。

*   **iPhone 17 Pro Max** 有望成为首款电池容量超过5,000 mAh的iPhone，并可能带来iPhone有史以来最长的电池续航。
*   **iPhone 17 Pro** 的电池容量预计将实现显著的同比提升。
*   **iPhone 17** 的电池续航相比iPhone 16预计不会有太大改进。
*   **iPhone 17 Air** 的电池容量最低。
*   苹果可能采用更致密的硅阳极电池技术，在更小的体积内提供更多能量，这将影响实际续航表现。

![iPhone 17 Pro Feature Dual](https://images.macrumors.com/t/HfYNm1_xwgjOOS20rR9fERytyNA=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/iPhone-17-Pro-Feature-Dual.jpg?lossy)

## SIM卡托
此前有传闻称iPhone 17 Air可能没有SIM卡托空间，这将使其无法在中国上市，因为中国要求手机必须有物理SIM卡托且不支持eSIM技术。然而，最近的电池数据库泄露信息提到了带有SIM卡托的iPhone 17 Air版本，这表明之前的传闻可能不准确。苹果不太可能放弃在中国市场推出其旗舰超薄设备。在美国，苹果已从iPhone 14开始取消了SIM卡托。在除中国以外的大多数国家，iPhone通常同时支持物理SIM卡和eSIM，但有传闻称无SIM卡托的iPhone将扩展到更多国家。

## 更厚的iPhone 17 Pro Max

*   **厚度**：iPhone 17 Pro Max的厚度将达到8.725毫米，比iPhone 16 Pro Max的8.25毫米更厚。
*   **额外空间**：增加的厚度可能用于容纳更大的电池和传闻中的相机功能，例如可调节光圈。
*   **感知度**：iPhone 17 Pro Max将比iPhone 16 Pro Max厚约5%，大多数用户可能不会注意到这一变化。
*   **重量**：尽管机身更厚、电池更大通常意味着重量增加，但苹果正从钛金属转向铝材，并用铝替换部分玻璃背板，因此整体重量可能保持不变甚至更轻。

## iPhone 17 挂绳
泄露的iPhone 17保护壳显示有挂绳连接点，周末也出现了一张配件图片。

![orange iphone 17 crossbody strap dickson](https://images.macrumors.com/t/gXSswTRR_CIETdWJv-ZXoZwZA3M=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/orange-iphone-17-crossbody-strap-dickson.jpg?lossy)

图片展示了一条亮橙色的长款斜挎挂绳，可能与iPhone 17 Pro的颜色相匹配。iPhone 17 Pro型号预计将提供橙色、深蓝色、黑色和白色。该挂绳具有柔性金属芯，并通过磁性连接点与iPhone保护壳连接。

## iPhone 17 Pro 设计
彭博社的Mark Gurman上周五澄清了iPhone 17 Pro和Pro Max的设计传闻。这两款智能手机预计将采用铝制机身，但在设备底部三分之二处有一个新的玻璃切口区域，该区域将用于无线充电。

![iPhone 17 Pro Lower Logo Magsafe 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Dnc1UD2rP75Dv7YQeNy5DzJJ0Gw=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-17-Pro-Lower-Logo-Magsafe-2.jpg?lossy)

这一更新的设计已传闻数月，此次澄清有助于确认半铝半玻璃设计的细节。

## 动态岛传闻
上周五，一位声称在iPhone屏幕保护膜公司工作的泄密者表示，iPhone 17的动态岛尺寸为1.5厘米，小于iPhone 16型号的2厘米。然而，在iPhone 17的传闻周期中，关于动态岛变化的传闻一直混杂，可靠消息来源则表示动态岛保持不变。动态岛的改变并非不可能，但可能性较低，且此传闻可靠性较低。大多数屏幕保护膜不包含动态岛的切口，因此配件制造商在iPhone 17发布前获得的CAD渲染图中是否包含此类信息尚不清楚。

## AirPods Pro 3
一项有些令人困惑的AirPods Pro 3最新传闻指出，苹果计划发布两个版本的AirPods Pro 3：

*   **标准版**。
*   **高端版**：配备红外摄像头，支持手势控制，但高端型号可能要到明年才会发布。

## Apple Watch SE 3 和 Ultra 3 确认
去年关于Apple Watch SE和Apple Watch Ultra更新的传闻并未实现。今年，我们再次听到关于新型号的相同传闻，并且看起来它们确实即将到来。一位有良好记录的泄密者证实，苹果计划在明天推出Apple Watch Series 11、Apple Watch SE 3和Apple Watch Ultra型号，所有这些都将配备与当前S10芯片架构相同的S11芯片。

## 发布会详情
苹果的“Awe Dropping”发布会将于太平洋时间9月9日（星期二）上午10:00开始。苹果将在其官网、YouTube以及Apple TV应用上进行直播。
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布会前夕，iPhone 17系列最新传闻浮出水面。电池容量数据显示，iPhone 17 Pro Max将首次突破5000mAh，有望实现最长续航。iPhone 17 Air或保留SIM卡托，可能在中国上市。iPhone 17 Pro Max机身略厚，以容纳更大电池和相机改进。新设计包括Pro型号的铝制机身和底部玻璃切口用于无线充电。此外，iPhone 17可能支持挂绳。发布会预计还将推出AirPods Pro 3（含高阶版）以及Apple Watch Series 11、SE 3和Ultra 3。
items.translated_title: iPhone 17：苹果发布会前夕的最新传闻汇总
items.content:
It's almost time for the September 9 Apple event, and last minute rumors have been trickling in. For a quick catch up, we've recapped the new information that we've heard over the last few days.


Battery


Alleged battery capacities for the iPhone 17 models were spotted in a Chinese regulatory database, and in the past, this database has provided accurate battery information.

  • iPhone 17 - 3,692 mAh

  • iPhone 17 Air - 3,149 mAh

  • iPhone 17 Pro - 4,252 mAh

  • iPhone 17 Pro Max - 5,088 mAh


It's worth noting that in some countries like China, there will be models with a SIM tray. ‌iPhone 17‌ models that have a SIM tray will have slightly smaller battery capacities, and the battery capacities above are for the non-SIM models that will be sold in countries like the United States.

The iPhone 17 Pro Max is expected to be the first iPhone that has a battery over 5,000 mAh, and it could have the longest ever battery life that we've seen in an ‌iPhone‌. There's also going to be an impressive year-over-year battery increase for the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌.

It doesn't look like the ‌iPhone 17‌ will offer much of an improvement over the iPhone 16, and of course, the iPhone 17 Air has the lowest capacity of the bunch. It will be interesting to see how it compares to the other models in terms of real-world battery life, because Apple may be using a denser silicone-anode battery that provides more energy in a smaller package.

SIM Trays


There have been multiple rumors suggesting that the ‌iPhone 17 Air‌ won't have the space for a SIM tray, which would prevent it from launching in China. iPhones sold in China are required to have a physical SIM tray, and carriers in the country do not support eSIM technology for smartphones.

The recent battery database leak mentions a variant of the ‌iPhone 17 Air‌ with a SIM tray, so it looks like information suggesting that the ‌iPhone 17 Air‌ won't be available in China could be inaccurate.

It would be surprising for Apple not to offer its flagship ultra thin device in China where it's likely to sell well.

Apple phased out SIM trays in the U.S. with the ‌iPhone‌ 14 launch. In most other countries aside from China, iPhones include both a SIM tray and an eSIM, but that could change this year. Rumors suggest that SIM-free iPhones will expand to more countries.

Thicker iPhone 17 Pro Max


The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max is going to measure in at 8.725mm thick, making it thicker than the 8.25mm iPhone 16 Pro Max. The extra space could allow for a larger battery and rumored camera features like an adjustable aperture. The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max will be about five percent thicker than the ‌iPhone 16 Pro‌ Max, and most people probably won't notice the increase.

A thicker chassis and a bigger battery typically means a higher weight, but Apple is transitioning to aluminum instead of titanium and replacing some of the glass at the back with aluminum, so overall weight could be the same or lower.

iPhone 17 Lanyard


We've seen leaked ‌iPhone 17‌ cases that have a spot where a lanyard can connect, and an image of the accessory surfaced over the weekend.


The image features a long crossbody strap in bright orange color that might match the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌. Both ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models are expected to come in an orange shade along with dark blue, black, and white.

The strap has a flexible metal core and uses magnetic attachment points to connect to the ‌iPhone‌ case.

iPhone 17 Pro Design


Last Friday, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman clarified ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ and Pro Max design rumors. The two smartphones are expected to be made from aluminum, but with a new cutout area on the bottom two thirds of the device. The cutout will be made from glass, and it will enable wireless charging.


This updated design has been rumored for months now, but it's useful to get some clarification on the half-aluminum half-glass rumors.

Sketchy Dynamic Island Rumors


On Friday, a leaker who claims to work for a company making ‌iPhone‌ screen protectors said the iPhone 17 Dynamic Island is 1.5cm, down from 2cm in the ‌iPhone 16‌ models.

There have been some mixed rumors of changes to the Dynamic Island over the ‌iPhone 17‌ rumor cycle, but reliable sources have suggested the ‌Dynamic Island‌ is the same. A change to the ‌Dynamic Island‌ is possible, but unlikely, and this rumor is on the sketchier side.

Most screen protectors do not include cutouts for the ‌Dynamic Island‌, and it's not clear if that information would have been included with CAD renders sourced by accessory makers ahead of the ‌iPhone 17‌'s launch.

AirPods Pro 3


In a somewhat confusing last minute AirPods Pro 3 rumor, a reliable leaker said that Apple plans to release two versions of the ‌AirPods Pro 3‌. There will be a standard version and a higher-end variant with an infrared camera for gesture controls, but we might not hear about the higher-end model until next year.

Apple Watch SE 3 and Ultra 3 Confirmed


Last year there were rumors that Apple would refresh the Apple Watch SE and the Apple Watch Ultra, but that didn't happen. We're hearing the same rumors about new models this year, and it looks like they're actually coming.

A leaker with an established track record confirmed that Apple is planning to introduce Apple Watch Series 11, ‌Apple Watch SE‌ 3, and Apple Watch Ultra models tomorrow, all with an S11 chip that uses the same architecture as the current S10 chip.

Read More


For a more detailed overview on what to expect from the Apple event, make sure to check out our dedicated guide that walks through everything Apple might announce.

  • Awe Dropping: Everything Coming at the September 9 Apple Event


How to Watch


Apple's "Awe Dropping" event will start at 10:00 a.m. Pacific Time on Tuesday, September 9. Apple will livestream the event on its website on YouTube, and through the Apple TV app on supported devices.


For those unable to watch the livestream, MacRumors will be providing full event coverage on MacRumors.com and the MacRumorsLive Twitter account. We'll also do a much deeper dive into all the announcements after the event.

items.title: 苹果发布会前夕再曝两条iPhone 17 Air和iPhone 17 Pro Max传闻 (原标题: Two More iPhone 17 Air and iPhone 17 Pro Max Rumors Drop Before Apple Event)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
本文报道了在苹果年度iPhone发布会前夕，来自中国的关于iPhone 17 Air和iPhone 17 Pro Max的最新传闻。

*   **iPhone 17 Air：**
    *   据微博用户Fixed Focus Digital称，由于缺少SIM卡槽，超薄iPhone 17 Air可能不会在中国上市。但监管数据库显示，可能存在带有SIM卡槽的版本，情况尚不明确。
    *   预计在大多数国家，iPhone 17 Air将完全依赖eSIM技术。

*   **iPhone 17 Pro Max：**
    *   微博用户Ice Universe重申，iPhone 17 Pro Max的厚度将为8.725mm，而iPhone 16 Pro Max的厚度为8.25mm。如果准确，iPhone 17 Pro Max将比iPhone 16 Pro Max厚约5%。
    *   据称，厚度增加是为了容纳容量更大的5,088 mAh电池。

*   **其他iPhone 17 Pro的细节：**
    *   iPhone 17 Pro型号将采用亮度更高的显示屏，更适合在阳光直射下长时间使用。

*   **AirPods Pro 3：**
    *   苹果准备在2025年和2026年推出两个版本的AirPods Pro 3。
    *   供应链分析师郭明錤表示，苹果计划今年推出AirPods Pro 3，最早可能在本周的苹果发布会上亮相。

*   **iPhone 17电池容量泄露：**
    *   中国监管数据库显示，iPhone 17 Air、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max的电池容量可能分别为：

![iPhone 17 Air Thumb 2 Blue Electric Boogaloo](https://images.macrumors.com/t/IKLZs9-BPvt-0N-CQYpIx3kz_5Y=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-17-Air-Thumb-2-Blue-Electric-Boogaloo.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 在苹果发布会前夕，关于iPhone 17 Air和iPhone 17 Pro Max的传闻浮出水面。iPhone 17 Air可能因缺少SIM卡槽而不在中国上市，预计将依赖eSIM技术。iPhone 17 Pro Max预计厚度将增加至8.725mm，以容纳更大容量的电池。此外，iPhone 17 Pro型号将采用亮度更高的显示屏。苹果还计划在2025年和2026年推出两个版本的AirPods Pro 3。中国监管数据库泄露了iPhone 17系列的电池容量信息。
items.translated_title: 苹果发布会前夕再曝两条iPhone 17 Air和iPhone 17 Pro Max传闻

images.alt: iPhone 17 Air Thumb 2 Blue Electric Boogaloo

items.content:
It is now the eve of Apple's annual iPhone event, and last-minute rumors about the iPhone 17 devices continue to surface out of China.


The latest rumors pertain to the iPhone 17 Air and the iPhone 17 Pro Max.

First, the account Fixed Focus Digital on Chinese social media platform Weibo today said the ultra-thin iPhone 17 Air is unlikely to launch in China, due to its lack of a SIM card slot. However, regulatory database listings suggested there would in fact be a variant of the iPhone 17 Air with a SIM card slot, so the situation is unclear. In any case, the iPhone 17 Air is expected to rely entirely on eSIM technology in most countries.

Second, the account Ice Universe on Weibo today reiterated that the iPhone 17 Pro Max will be 8.725mm thick, whereas the iPhone 16 Pro Max is 8.25mm thick. If this information is accurate, the iPhone 17 Pro Max would be approximately 5% thicker than the iPhone 16 Pro Max. The account previously suggested the device would be thicker in order to accommodate a larger battery with a leaked 5,088 mAh capacity.

Both of the Weibo accounts have pretty good track records. We will find out if these rumors prove to be true in around 24 hours from now.

*   **套餐内容**：包括Disney+（含广告）、Hulu（含广告）和ESPN Unlimited。
*   **促销价格**：首年每月29.99美元。
